member.name: T:Mediachase.Data.Provider.MasterCacheKeys
member.summary: Returns cache keys that should be used as master key dependencies for other objects, to get those other objects purged form the cache when their dependent data changes.

member.name: F:Mediachase.Data.Provider.MasterCacheKeys.RootKey
member.summary: The root key that all inserts to CatalogCache depend on

member.name: F:Mediachase.Data.Provider.MasterCacheKeys.AnyEntryKey
member.summary: Gets a cache key which is purged when any entry is updated.

member.name: M:Mediachase.Data.Provider.MasterCacheKeys.GetEntryKey(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a cache key which is purged when the specific entry is updated.
member.returns: The cache key to use as master key for another cache entry.

member.name: F:Mediachase.Data.Provider.MasterCacheKeys.AnyNodeKey
member.summary: Gets a cache key which is purged when any node is updated.

member.name: M:Mediachase.Data.Provider.MasterCacheKeys.GetNodeKey(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a cache key which is purged when the specific node is updated.
member.returns: The cache key to use as master key for another cache entry.

member.name: F:Mediachase.Data.Provider.MasterCacheKeys.AnyCatalogKey
member.summary: Gets a cache key which is purged when any catalog is updated.

member.name: M:Mediachase.Data.Provider.MasterCacheKeys.GetCatalogKey(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a cache key which is purged when the specific catalog is updated.
member.returns: The cache key to use as master key for another cache entry.

member.name: F:Mediachase.Data.Provider.MasterCacheKeys.AnyEntryRelationKey
member.summary: Gets a cache key which is purged when any entry-entry relation is updated.

member.name: M:Mediachase.Data.Provider.MasterCacheKeys.GetEntryRelationKey(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a cache key which is purged when an entry-entry relation with the specific entry at either end of the relation is updated.
member.returns: The cache key to use as master key for another cache entry.

member.name: F:Mediachase.Data.Provider.MasterCacheKeys.AnyNodeRelationKey
member.summary: Gets a cache key which is purged when any node-node or node-entry relation is updated.

member.name: M:Mediachase.Data.Provider.MasterCacheKeys.GetNodeRelationKeyForNode(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a cache key which is purged when a node-node or node-entry relation with the specific node at either end of the relation is updated.
member.returns: The cache key to use as master key for another cache entry.

member.name: M:Mediachase.Data.Provider.MasterCacheKeys.GetNodeRelationKeyForEntry(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a cache key which is purged when a node-entry relation of the specific entry is updated.
member.returns: The cache key to use as master key for another cache entry.

member.name: F:Mediachase.Data.Provider.MasterCacheKeys.AnyAssociationKey
member.summary: Gets a cache key which is purged when any association is updated.

member.name: M:Mediachase.Data.Provider.MasterCacheKeys.GetAssociationKey(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a cache key which is purged when the associations for the specific entry are updated.
member.returns: The cache key to use as master key for another cache entry.

member.name: F:Mediachase.Data.Provider.MasterCacheKeys.AnyAssociationTypeKey
member.summary: Gets a cache key which is purged when any association type is updated.

member.summary: Gets a cache key which is purged when any currency is updated.

member.summary: Gets a cache key which is purged when any warehouse is updated.

member.summary: Gets a cache key which is purged when any tax category is updated.

member.summary: Gets a cache key which is purged when the tax categories for the specific tax category is updated.

member.summary: Gets a cache key which is purged when the tax categories for the specific tax category is updated.

member.name: M:Mediachase.Data.Provider.TransactionScope.OpenConnection(System.Data.IDbCommand,System.String,Mediachase.Data.Provider.TransactionScope.ConnectionDelegate)
member.summary: Assigns a connection and a transaction to the specified database command. The connection and transaction will be reused if there is a transaction in progress on the specified database.
member.param: The connection string of the target database.
A delegate for creating database connections.
member.returns: True if a new connection was created, otherwise false.
member.remarks: If true is returned, the caller will be reponsible for closing the database connection.

member.returns: A database connection.
